message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
I understand your position, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $105? This is a very special product and I'm sure you'll find it worth the price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me there?
